channel.title: FX Macro + Technical
channel.description: Automated FX Macro + Technical Analysis Feed

item.title: EUR/USD
item.description:
Macro: ECB guidance, Bund yields, eurozone data watch.
Tech: key rails around spot EUR/USD (support/resistance).

item.title: GBP/USD
item.description:
Macro: BoE policy expectations, gilt curve, UK CPI flows.
Tech: GBP/USD support/resistance rails.

item.title: USD/JPY
item.description:
Macro: BoJ policy stance, JGB yields, risk sentiment flows.
Tech: USD/JPY reference rails around spot.
